messages.raw: [W:02][S:03]Yahaha! You found me![K][2]The trees remember when pirates[V]wore scales...[K]
[W:02][S:03]Yahaha! You found me![K][2]Before the silence, this was[V]the Age of Secrets.[K]
[W:02][S:03]Yahaha! You found me![K][2]The island of Kalyxo has seen[V]many masters. None last.[K]
[W:02][S:03]Yahaha! You found me![K][2]The guardians of the shrines[V]were bound by Farore's will.[K]
[W:02][S:03]Yahaha! You found me![K][2]The old king sleeps beneath the[V]mountain of fire...[K]
[W:02][S:03]Yahaha! You found me![K][2]The first hero did not banish[V]the evil, he only sealed it.[K]
[W:02][S:03]Yahaha! You found me![K][2]The Eon Abyss... it sang a sad[V]song before the darkness came.[K]
[W:02][S:03]Yahaha! You found me![K][2]The twin witches watch from the[V]shadows. Their magic is old.[K]
[W:02][S:03]Yahaha! You found me![K][2]Farore's binding weakens. The[V]seals will not hold forever.[K]
[W:02][S:03]Yahaha! You found me![K][2]We watched the hero fall. We[V]watched the knight rise. Same[V]soul, different shadow...[K]
